lead_paragraph: Mr. Posner, who was killed in a boat collision in Florida, worked with his father, Victor, in hostile takeovers that led to the convictions of Michael Milken and Ivan Boesky.
snippet: Mr. Posner, who was killed in a boat collision in Florida, worked with his father, Victor, in hostile takeovers that led to the convictions of Michael Milken and Ivan Boesky.

headline.main: Steven Posner, 67, Former Corporate Raider, Dies
headline.seo: Steven Posner, 67, Former Corporate Raider, Dies
